subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Native Americans
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel was taken eighth over all by the Atlanta Dream on Monday night, making her the highest Native American drafted in the W.N.B.A.
snippet: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel was taken eighth over all by the Atlanta Dream on Monday night, making her the highest Native American drafted in the W.N.B.A.
